text: Israr Ahmad (Urdu: اسرار احمد) was born on 26th April 1932, in Hisar, India. He was a Pakistani Islamic scholar who was followed particularly in South Asia.Our Staff Reporter (15 April 2010). "Prominent scholar Dr Israr Ahmed dies". Dawn Archives, 15 April 2010. Retrieved 15 March 2013. islamabad.net, "Dr. Israr Ahmed" Archived 29 March 2008 at the Wayback Machine. He had contributed in Islamic law, Quranic explanation, literature, philosophy. He was awarded the sitara-i-imtiaz in 1982. == Death == Ahmad died of a heart related problem on 14th April 2010 in Lahore.News, Arab. "Renowned Islamic scholar Dr Israr Ahmed is dead". Arabnews.com. Archived from the original on 27 September 2011.
